search_general_talk_ch0130_10_serena/440: Let’s have a look around the area!

Hey! You haven’t seen a Growlithe around here,
have you?

I can’t find him anywhere! If you see him, let me
know, OK?

Sure! We can keep an eye out for you. I’ll let
you know if we find him!
Come on, let’s help search for Growlithe!

Certainly! We can look for the lost Pokémon
while we search for the sparkly green things.
Where’d my Growlithe run off to?

I found a green, sparkly thing on the ground a
moment ago... It looked like the sort of thing that
would make my Altaria even more gorgeous.

But I guess I’ll never know—a Growlithe ran
past me and carried it off!

A Growlithe? I think I did hear some growling
noises nearby...
Hey! Is there a Growlithe hiding over there?
Oh, are you looking for Growlithe, too?
N-no! Hoping I don’t run into it, actually...
Hey! Is there a Growlithe hiding over there?
Nope, doesn’t look like it.

Phew... That’s good. This crazy Growlithe’s been
chasing me all over the place!

Oh! You’re part of Team Break? Maybe he was
chasing you because of your mask.

If you’re smart, you’ll learn from this lesson and
leave Team Break for good.
Sh-shut up!

Like I’d actually leave Team Break just because
one little Growlithe scared me—

Eeeeek! It saw me! You said it wasn’t here, you
big liaaaars!
Look! My Growlithe came back!
Glad you found each other again!

Me too! He was carrying this in his mouth...
Do any of you know what it is?
*gasp* Look, Professor!

It seems Growlithe found what we’ve been
searching for.
Yeah!
It’s got some drool on it now, but that’s OK!
Let’s collect Zygarde’s cells!

Ready to finish up here? Did we find enough
Zygarde cells?
I want to keep looking.
OK! Let’s go search for some more!
I think we’re done.
OK! Let’s catch up with the rest of the group.
search_general_talk_ch0130_10_serena/441: My search has been going pretty well!

Hm? You’re looking for something? I haven’t seen
anything around here.
Huh? You think there’s something behind me?
You just don’t give up, do you...

Could you leave me alone? Do your searching
somewhere else!
Ugh! Fine! I’ll move out of your way, all right?!

All I wanted to do was take a cute selfie with
this sparkly stuff in the background! Jeez...

Umm, are you looking for something? Is it green
and, um, sparkly?

I found it! Do you want it? Um, I can give it
to you.
I’m so thirsty. Do you have any drinks?

Oooh! I love sweet drinks! I can drink them now
because I’m four!

Water? I guess that’s OK... You don’t have
anything else?

If only you had Soda Pop... I need some sugar
in my life.
